text: Jason Corder (born 1969) is an American actor based in Kenya. He is known for playing Donald John in the web series Oh-Bama (2016-2017). He also played Shane in the television series Stay (2013-2014), which he also created. Corder also appeared in the short film Intellectual Scum (2015). Corder grew up in Marin County, California. He moved to Kenya in 2008, initially to teach art at the University of Nairobi. He is the father of two sons. ==Select filmography== *The Rugged Priest (2011) *The Lion Standing in the Wind (2015) *Intellectual Scum (2015) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1969 births Category:People from Marin County, California Category:American male film actors Category:American male television actors Category:21st-century American male actors Category:University of Nairobi academics Category:American expatriates in Kenya
title: Jason Corder
